ModMetaData.name: Duty Tally
ModMetaData.author: mrclrchtr
ModMetaData.description:
Keep your colony running smoothly with Duty Tally!
This lightweight mod adds a "Workload" column to the Work tab, showing exactly how many work types each colonist is assigned. Instantly see who’s overworked or underutilized and manage your pawns’ workload with precision.
Features: ✅ Workload Column: See assigned job counts at a glance in the Work tab. ✅ Sortable: Click the column header to easily organize colonists by workload. ✅ Configurable: Option to ignore invisible work types (like those added by other mods). ✅ Vanilla-Friendly: Integrates seamlessly with the standard RimWorld UI.
"The Overseer’s best friend since 5500."
